comments: Author's own choice to use Delgadillo  as the surname (more unusual than Ramirez).
examples: Bessera tuitensis R.Delgad. in Bol. Inst. Bot. (Guadalajara), 1(3): 131  (1992). Cypripedium luzmarianum R.González & R.Delgad. in  Bol. Inst. Bot. (Guadalajara), 1(2): 64 (1992).
source: IKdb. Date from Index Herbariorum (1990). Obit. in Bol. Soc. Bot. México, 88: 79-80 (2011), incl. portr.
